2.3. SteelScript Application Framework InstallationÂ¶

The SteelScript Application Framework is based on Python Django and builds upon the Core SteelScript for Python SDK. It provides the foundation for a web application that can query, process, and display customized metrics and analysis using Riverbed’s Open APIs and other data sources.

The Application Framework comes pre-installed and configured in our SteelScript VM.

Once you have the VM up and running in your enviroment, see the complete App Framework documentation <appfwk/overview>.
